hero.title: ESM Click
hero.subtitle: Corporate Performance Management, Business Intelligence and Reporting Platform
hero.description: Turn your data into strategic power.ESM Click is an integrated Corporate Performance Management (CPM) and Business Intelligence (BI) platform that enables organizations to analyze financial, operational and managerial data on a single unified interface.Fully integrated with ERP systems, it consolidates all data sources regardless of complexity, providing actionable insights and a clear view of your entire business.

benefits: Full ERP integration for seamless data management.
Budget vs actual comparisons and variance analysis.
Consolidated cost, revenue and profitability insights.
Responsive dashboards for web and mobile users.

features.title: Budget and Financial Analysis
features.description: Consolidates budget, actual and forecast data into a single framework.Enables precise financial performance tracking and optimization.

features.title: Interactive Dashboards and Visualization
features.description: Transforms complex data into intuitive visual analytics.Tracks KPIs such as sales, margins and cost deviations in real time.

features.title: Consolidated Reporting
features.description: Aggregates data from multiple branches or subsidiaries.Delivers insights by region, product, representative, customer or brand.

features.title: Mobile Access and Continuous Data Updates
features.description: Daily data synchronization keeps all reports up to date.Mobile-friendly interface ensures executives stay connected anytime.
